# Zika Virus
## Streamgraph

```{r, out.width="60%", fig.align="center", fig.cap="Photo by Wilsan U on Unsplash"}

masthead <- "assets/wilsan-u-unsplash.jpg"
knitr::include_graphics(masthead, dpi=72)

```

***

### Ingest
#### country, year, number of tests


```{r, echo=FALSE}

df <- read.csv("archetypes/zika-virus-epidemic/paho-zika.csv", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)
df

```

### Wrangle
#### filter cases


```{r, echo=FALSE}

df_wrangle <- filter(df, Total_Cases > 0)
df_wrangle

```

### Streamgraph
#### color by country


```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1080/72, out.width="100%"}

theme_opts <- theme(
  legend.position = "bottom",
  legend.title = element_blank(),
  axis.text.y = element_blank(),
  axis.line.y = element_blank(),
  axis.ticks.y = element_blank(),
  axis.title.y = element_blank(),
  # panel.grid = element_blank(),
  # panel.grid.major = element_blank(),
  panel.grid.minor = element_blank(),
  panel.background=element_rect(fill="white", colour="white"),
  panel.border = element_blank(),
  plot.background = element_blank(),
)

code_pal <- c("CHN" = "#ef5350", 
              "GBR" = "#0D47A1",
              "ISR" = "#FFA000",
              "PAK" = "#388E3C",
              "USA" = "#0288D1",
              "FRA" = "#00BCD4",
              "IND" = "#EF6C00",
              "RUS" = "#c62828")

v1 <- ggplot(df_wrangle, aes(x = Year, y = Total_Cases, group = Country_or_Subregion, fill = Country_or_Subregion)) +
  stat_steamgraph(color="#ffffff") +
  #scale_x_continuous(breaks = c(1945, 1950, 1955, 1960, 1965, 1970, 1975, 1980, 1985, 1990, 1995, 2000)) +
  #scale_fill_manual(values = code_pal ) +
  #coord_fixed( 0.2 * diff(range(df$Year)) / diff(range(df$N))) +
  theme_bw() +
  theme_opts +
  xlab(NULL) +
  ylab(NULL)

girafe(ggobj = v1, width_svg = 1280/72, height_svg = 720/72,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0))
)

```

### Streamgraph
#### with annotations

```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, echo=TRUE, class.source ='fold-hide', fig.width=1920/72, fig.height=1080/72, out.width="100%"}

v2 <- v1 + 
  coord_cartesian(clip="off") +
  annotate("text", x = 1962, y = 80, label = "Peak testing of nuclear\nweapons in 1962", hjust = "center", size = 3, fontface = 2) +
  annotate("text", x = 1998, y = 15, label = "Pakistan\nConducted 3 test in\n1998", hjust = "center", size = 3, fontface = 2) +
  annotate("text", x = 1998, y = -10, label = "India Conducted\n5 test in 1998", hjust = "center", size = 3, fontface = 2)

girafe(ggobj = v2, width_svg = 1280/72, height_svg = 720/72,
       options = list(opts_sizing(rescale = TRUE, width = 1.0))
)

```



```{r, echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, class.source='fold-show'}

# eval = FALSE as default; run manually as chunk

# full version
ggsave(filename = "outputs/zika-virus-epidemic-fs.svg", plot = v1, width=1280/72, height=720/72)

# thumbnail version without annotations
ggsave(filename = "outputs/zika-virus-epidemic-sm.svg", plot = v1, width=4, height=2.25)

```
